name: Zorbit Covers
description:
Thumbnails or Cover for the Figma documents.

At every stage of design project change your cover status to reflect the status of the document.


Some example status include

  • In Design
  • In Development
  • Ready for development
  • Launched
  • Archived
  • JAM session
  • Paused


I will add more status as requests comes in.


Cheers,

Jit
